name: Keep It Short
description:
A short game about giving a short speech. 

Made for Eggplant Podcast Community Game Jam #3

How to play

Give your speech while avoiding angry guests (red). If an angry guest gets too close, they will steal your microphone and end the game.

You must complete a line of dialogue to progress to the next part of the speech.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • Click / Space - Toggle microphone
  • Q - Select Option 1
  • E - Select Option 2
